DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study aims to i) represents the feasibility of the study design and ii) to point out acute effects of thoracic spine mobilization on skin-blood flow, erythema and the sympathetic nervous system.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Thoracic Spine Mobilization on Sympathetic Nervous Systems
DOC.criteria: age 20 30 years healthy persons current pain blood pressure medications osteoporosis cardiac or neurological symptoms pregnancy thromobosis
